title: Foundation Facilities Insignia
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:paperstack]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:toggle-sidebar]]

[[module CSS]]
@media (min-width: 768px) {
    #main-content { max-width: min(900px, calc(100% - 4rem)); }
}
:root {
  --header-subtitle: "Secure Facilities";
  --sp_header-subtitle-scale: 2.125;
}
#header h1 a::before, #header h2 span::before {
    font-family: 'BauhausLTDemi', 'Nanum Gothic', 'Arial', sans-serif;
}

body {
    background-image: linear-gradient(
        to bottom,
        #FCFCFC, #FCFCFC 100%);
}

div#extra-div-1 {
    height: 140px;
    width: 100%;
    top: 28px;
    position: absolute;
    background: url("https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/sigma-9-themes/SCP_F.png");
    background-size: contain;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-position: calc(50vw - 380px) 50%;
    z-index: -1;
}
@media (max-width: 767px) {
    div#extra-div-1 {
         opacity: 0.2;
         background-position: 50% 50%;
    }
}

.socontent.header h1 {
    font-size: 1.85rem;
    max-width: max-content;
    margin: 2.5rem auto 1rem;
}
.socontent.header h1 span {
    padding: 0 .25em;
    text-transform: uppercase;
}

.art-container {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    align-content: center;
    justify-content: space-around;
    align-self: flex-end
    gap: 1rem 1rem;
}
.art-container .art {
    flex: 0 1 250px;
    text-align: center;
    padding-bottom: 1rem;
}

.art-container .art .image-container {
    padding: 0;
    min-height: 100%;
    max-width: 100%;
}
[[/module]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]
@@@@
[[[jerden-insignia| Jerden's Art Page]]] / [[[secure-facilities-locations|Foundation Facilities]]] » Foundation Facilities Insignia

Since I've now branched out into other types of logo, I decided to give the insignia I made for the [[[secure-facilities-locations| Foundation Facilities]]] page their own gallery - anything not shown here is simply not one of mine. I am happy to make more of these, it's a lot of fun, but my policy is that I'll only do it if your Site meets the requirements for the [[[secure-facilities-locations|Facilities page]]]. I'm happy for people to DM me about Secure Facility Dossiers they're working on, but to be honest standalone Site dossiers are rarely successful, and I'd rather not create logos for something that'll get deleted.

Feel free to make use of these anywhere you like, and feel free to modify them if you want to make your own, I mostly work from existing ones as templates.

[[=]]
+ Site Insignia
[[/=]]

A basic design, a black border containing a number. It's amazing how much you can do with such a simple starting point!

[[div class="art-container"]]  

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-01.svg title="Site 01, Undisclosed Location." width="250px"]]
++ Protected Site-01, Overwatch HQ
I wanted this to be very simple and location nonspecific. I got the Triangles from [[*user EstrellaYoshte]]'s [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/desk-of-junior-designer-s-yvonne| Overwatch Command]]] logo, I added the "OVERWATCH" text to fill space.
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-06.svg title="Site 06, Lorraine, France." width="250px"]]
++ Humanoid Containment Site-06-3, Loraine, France
Obviously inspired by the [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_France Flag of France], but the three little birds are from the Flag of [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lorraine Lorraine], to make the logo a little more specific to that location. My personal headcanon is that it's disguised as a prison, I'll go into detail if I get around to writing about it.
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-11.svg title="Site 11, Lansing, Michigan."  width="250px"]]
++ Site-11, Lansing, Michigan
Based on the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Seal_of_Michigan Seal of Michigan], very much inspired by the Logos HarryBlank did for Site-11 and Site-19, but with the addition of Lances, inspired by the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Canting_arms Canting arms] of the [https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:CoA_Roman_Catholic_Diocese_of_Lansing.svg Roman Catholic Diocese of Lansing]. (Lansing, Lance-ing, get it?)
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-12.svg title="Site 12, Devon, England, UK."  width="250px"]]
++ Site-12, Devon, England
Based on the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Devon Flag of Devon], with a [https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:SVG_coat_of_arms_elements_-_books_00.svg book] overlaid to represent its purpose as an archive and library for the History Department.
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-14.svg title="Site 14, Sacramento, California."  width="250px"]]
++ Protected Site-14, Sacramento, California
Based on Agente Shuffle's logo for the [[[Telecommunications Monitoring Office]]], with the white background with a red band at the bottom inspired by the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_California Flag of California].
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-15.svg title="Site 15, Silicon Valley, California."  width="250px"]]
++ Site-15, Silicon Valley, California
Colors and central star taken from the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Santa_Clara_County,_California Flag of Santa Clara County, California] with the addition of the [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/desk-of-junior-designer-s-yvonne|Infotech Department]]] logo.
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] show="▷ " hide="◁ Site-17"]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-17.svg title="Site 17, Undisclosed Location."  width="250px"]]
++ Site-17, Undisclosed Location
Inspired by the [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/desk-of-junior-designer-s-yvonne| Site-17 Deepwell]]] logo. 
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-18.svg title="Site 18, Undisclosed Location."  width="250px"]]
++ Site-18, Undisclosed Location
I liked the idea of Site-18 literally being halfway between 17 and 19, the design reflects that.
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-19.svg title="Site 19, Undisclosed Location."  width="250px"]]
++ Site-19, Undisclosed Location
Obviously based on my Site-17 logo, but I do like the sickly green - it's meant to seem Safe, but to me it seems very cold and institutional, which I like.
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-23.svg title="Site-23." width="250px"]]
++ Storage Site-23, Undisclosed Location
Refined this one over time - it's a storage Site in an unknown location, so it's a box, but the box contains a biohazard due to that being one of the focuses of the Site. The color scheme implies that it's in the USA, I suppose.
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] show="▷ " hide="◁ Site-28, New York"]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-28.svg title="Site-28, SoHo, New York." width="250px"]]
++ Site-28, Manhattan, New York
Based on the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flags_of_New_York_City Flag of New York City], incorporating the logo of the [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/desk-of-junior-designer-s-yvonne|Department of Artistic Anomalies]]], since the site focuses on art. 
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-34.svg title="Site-34, Spanish Branch." width="250px"]]
++ Site-34, Spanish Branch
Slight edit of a design HarryBlank already did, based on the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_the_Hispanic_People Flag of the Hispanic People]. I was told on the Spanish Discord that the tilde above the number improved it, the letter ñ is a distinctive feature of the Spanish language.
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-36.svg title="Site-36, India." width="250px"]]
++ Site-36, India
Based on the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_India Flag of India] - Harry Blank did something very similar but I like the addition of the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ashoka_Chakra Ashoka Chakra], since the Site has a focus on theological anomalies. In my head the Foundation obviously has many other facilities in India, but I think most of those could use designs from the flags and heraldry of specific regions.
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-38.svg title="Site-38, Tennessee, Escobar." width="250px"]]
++  Site-38, Tennessee
Based on the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Tennessee Flag of Tennessee], one of the top-tier US state flags.

[[/div]]
[[div class="art"]] show="▷ Site-41, Antimemetics Division, Colorado" hide="◁ Site-41, Antimemetics Division, Colorado"]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-41.svg title="Site-41, Colorado, qntm." width="250px"]]
++  Site-41, Colorado
Based on of the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Colorado Flag of Colorado] combined with the [[*user EstrellaYoshte]]'s [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/desk-of-junior-designer-s-yvonne| Antimemetics Division]]] logo - I think it works pretty well!

[[/div]]
[[div class="art"]] show="▷ " hide="◁ Site-42, Broken Masquerade, North Carolina"]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-42.svg title="Site-42, North Carolina." width="250px"]]
++ Site-42, North Carolina
Site-42 from the [[[broken-masquerade-hub|Broken Masquerade Canon]]] has quite a detailed description, so I wanted to make a logo based on the [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_North_Carolina Flag of North Carolina]. 

[[/div]]
[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-44.svg title="Site-44, Foulness, Essex, England, Ozzylizard" width="250px"]]
++ Site-44, Foulness, Essex, England
Based on the [https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Essex Flag of Essex], but with a green background and a circular arrangement to reflect its location and former designation as Site Green.  I'm very pleased that [[*user OzzyLizard]] liked it enough to use it in the [[[secure-facility-dossier-site-44| Site-44 Secure Facility Dossier]]].
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] show="▷ " hide="◁ Site-45, Australia"]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-45.svg title="Site 45, Australia, LurkD" width="250px"]]
++ Site-45, Australia
This is based on the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Australia Flag of Australia], but I've adjusted the position of the stars in the Southern Cross to make it more recognisable.
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-45-PH.svg title="Site 45, Las Vegas, Fantem." width="250px"]]
++ Site-45, ㄗitch 卄aven, Las Vegas, Nevada
The first one I showed to an author, thanks for being so enthusiastic [[*user Fantem]], and putting it on the [[[pitch-haven-hub|ㄗitch 卄aven Hub]]]. It's inspired by the monochrome artwork of [[*user SunnyClockwork]] on the hub.
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-50.svg title="Site-50, Tokyo, Japan, Maxyfran73." width="250px"]]
++ Site-50, Tokyo, Japan
Based on the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Symbols_of_Tokyo Metropolitan Crest] of Tokyo, with an edit to the direction of the rays to make it more SCP themed.
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-54.svg title="Site-54, Leipzig, Saxony, Germany." width="250px"]]
++ Site-54, Leipzig, Saxony, Germany
Combining the Flags of [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leipzig Leipzig], [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Saxony Saxony], and [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Germany Germany]. German approved (thanks [[*user Allnyta]])! I'm not 100% sure on this one since it's a little too colorful, but in this case the principle of "use meaningful symbolism" overrides the principle of "use 2-3 colors".
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-55.svg title="Site-55, Boston, Massachusetts." width="250px"]]
++ Site-55, Boston, Massachusetts
Harry Blank did something similar already but I remade it, I wanted something a bit more colourful. This version combines the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Boston Flag of Boston] and the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Massachusetts Flag of Massachusetts].
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-56.svg title="Site-56, Black Rock Desert, Nevada, Uranium Empire." width="250px"]]
++ Site-56, Nevada
I wanted something that represented the aesthetic of the [[[the-trashfire| Trashfire Canon]]], something dark and sinister, and since "The Kraken Protocol" is part of Site-56's history, I found my way to a [http://heraldicart.org/viking-answer-lady-svg-images-for-heralds heraldry website].
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-58.svg title="Site-58, Nanticoke, Philadelphia." width="250px"]]
++ Anomalous Relations Site-58, Nanticoke, Philadelphia
Based on [[[secure-facility-dossier-site-58| an original design]]] by [[*user OriTiefling]], but the Progress Pride Flag is CC-NC and so I redesigned it - it's actually based on the original public domain [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pride_flag 8-Stripe Pride Flag], because we wanted to get the pink and cyan from the Transgender flag in there. 
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-62.svg title="Site 62, SCP-004." width="250px"]]
++ Dimensional Site-62, SCP-004
This one is pretty basic, there's not really anything really distinctive about this Site beyond it being inside [[[SCP-004]]] so it was a hard one to work on. Went with a purple padlock, I tried making it a few different colors but I didn't really like any of them. 
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-64.svg title="Site 64, Portland, Oregon." width="250px"]]
++ Storage Site-64, Portland, Oregon
The first one is based on the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Portland,_Oregon Flag of Portland], I wanted something that works well at a very small size.
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Big64.png title="Site 64, Oregon." width="250px"]]
++ Site-64, Portland, Oregon
I do like the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Oregon Flag of Oregon] so I used that to make a more detailed version with a couple of [[[those-twisted-pines-hub|Those Twisted Pines]]] ([https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pine_Tree_Flag from here]) and a [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/three-portlands-hub Rose] to represent Portland.
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-65.svg title="Site 65, Saskatchewan." width="250px"]]
++ Site-65, Saskatchewan
[[[Welcome to Wonderful Site-65]]] is very entertaining, I wanted to do something based on the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Saskatchewan Flag of Saskatchewan], although I deleted a lot of details from the flower to make it look better at a smaller size.
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-66.svg width="250px"]]
++ Biological Containment Site-66, Undisclosed Location
Inspired by [[[SCP-1479]]], trees are from the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pine_Tree_Flag Pine Tree Flag].
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-73.svg title="Site-73, Texas." width="250px"]]
++ Site-73, Texas
Based on the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Texas Flag of Texas].
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-76.svg title="Site 76." width="250px"]]
++ Reliquary Site-76
Historic, American, couldn't really think of anything other than this for than the Betsy Ross [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_the_United_States Flag of the United States]. This is a Site I ended up expanding on when writing up the description of it for the new Facilities page, it was lacking anything distinctive.
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-77.svg title="Site 77,  Abruzzo, Italy." width="250px"]]
++ Site-77, Abruzzo, Italy
Based on the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Italy Flag of Italy] and the Coat of Arms of [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Abruzzo Abruzzo].
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-79.svg title="Site 79,  Yumegemu, Japan." width="250px"]]
++  Site-79, Yumegemu, Japan
Obviously based on the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Japan Flag of Japan], but since Yumegemu is a Nexus themed around video games I went with a pixelated version of the red circle. Every time I see this, I hear the faint sound of an 8-bit soundtrack...
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-80.svg title="Site 80, Tiveden National Park, Örebro County, Sweden" width="250px"]]
++ Site-80, Sweden
Based on the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Sweden Flag of Sweden] (3-fold instead of a cross, but I like this variant for SCP sites) and the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/%C3%96rebro_County Örebro County Coat of Arms] - I think the flower and trees/flames are fitting for a Site beneath a National Park!
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-81.svg title="Site 81, Bloomington, Indiana, djkaktus" width="250px"]]
++ Site-81, Indiana
This design is a modification of the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Indiana Flag of Indiana], I basically deleted everything except the stars in order to simplify the design - the number covered up the torch anyway so there was no point in keeping it.  
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-83.svg title="Site 83, New Jersey, Marcelles Raynes" width="250px"]]
++ Site-83, New Jersey
Based on the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Coat_of_arms_and_flag_of_New_Jersey Flag of New Jersey]. 
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-84.svg title="Site 84, 84, Alice Springs, Australia, " width="250px"]]
++ Site-84, Alice Springs, Norther Territory, Australia
Based on the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_the_Northern_Territory Flag of the Northern Territory].
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-88.svg title="Site 88,  Alabama." width="250px"]]
++ Site-88, Alabama
Based off the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Alabama Flag of Alabama], but I felt it was lacking something so I added a Yellow [https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Meuble_h%C3%A9raldique_marteau.svg Hammer]. I'm aware that Alabama Yellowhammers are actually as type of bird, but visual puns actually have a [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Canting_arms long tradition in heraldry], and I like the way this design looks.
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-91.svg title="Site-91, Yorkshire, England, UK, Grigori Karpin." width="250px"]]
++ Site-91, Hecatoncheires Cycle, Yorkshire, England
Based of the flag of [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flags_and_symbols_of_Yorkshire Yorkshire], incorporating the hands from the logo on the [[[hecatoncheires-cycle-hub| Hecatoncheires Cycle Hub]]]. I previously lived in the north of England, so this is one of my favourite designs.
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-98.svg title="Site-98, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania." width="250px"]]
++ Site-98, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
Based of the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Philadelphia Flag of Philadelphia], with the [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/desk-of-junior-designer-s-yvonne Department of Sciences] logo by [[*user EstrellaYoshte]]. 
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-103.svg title="Bio-Site-103." width="250px"]]
++ Bio-Site-103, Undisclosed Location
I wanted a flower, the exact colour (peach) was inspired by [[[SCP-757]]]. It originally had 5 petals but threefold symetry looks so much better with this template.
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-104.svg title="Site-104." width="250px"]]
++ Bio-Site-104, Undisclosed Location
The dead tree is more [http://heraldicart.org/viking-answer-lady-svg-images-for-heralds heraldry], and is intended to be a depiction of [[[SCP-628]]].
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-107.svg title="Site-107, Egypt, RadiantGold." width="250px"]]
++ Site-107, Giza, Egypt
The colors come from the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Egypt Flag of Egypt], but because of the location west of Giza and the general focus on Ancient Egyptian anomalies I've included a depiction of the three Great Pyramids. 
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-118.svg title="Site-118, Sonoran Desert, Arizona, Ethagon." width="250px"]]
++ Site-118, Sonora Desert, Arizona
Based on the the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Arizona Flag of Arizona], with a labyrinth below to indicate the site is subterranean and concealed.
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-119.svg title="Site-119, Mound City, Kansas." width="250px"]]
++ Site-119, Mound City, Kansas
Same design as the Site-15 logo, but in the colors of the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Kansas Flag of Kansas].
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-120.svg title="Site 120, Częstochowa, Silesian Voivodeship, Poland, Ralliston." width="250px"]]
++ Site-120, From 120's Archives, Silesian Voivodeship, Poland
Based on the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Poland Flag of Poland], with the addition of the [[[secure-facility-dossier-site-120| Ontokinetics logo in 120 brown]]].
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-184.svg title="Site 184, Nova Scotia, Canada, DodoDevil." width="250px"]]
++ Site-184, Nova Scotia, Canada
The background of the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Nova_Scotia Flag of Nova Scotia], defaced (technical term) with a [https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Anchor_pictogram_red.svg#/media/File:Anchor_pictogram_red.svg big red anchor]. I'm very pleased that [[*user DodoDevil]] liked it enough to use it in the [[[secure-facility-dossier-site-184| Site-184 Secure Facility Dossier]]].
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-201.svg title="Site-201, Ontario, NatVoltaic." width="250px"]]
++ Site-201, Ontario, Canada
Based on the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Coat_of_arms_of_Ontario Arms of Ontario], with the inclusion of Lake Ontario and a stylised depiction of the [[[lake-ontario-array| Arete Dimensional Array]]].
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-228.svg title="Site-228, Hungary, Cremo." width="250px"]]
++ Site-228, Hungary
Since we only have one Site in Hungary, I just used the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Hungary Flag of Hungary].
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-234.svg title="Site 234, Alabama, Dr. Bleep." width="250px"]]
++ Site-234, Alabama
The biohazard symbol for this biological research facility looks great and is very appropriate, plus using the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Alabama Alabama colors] makes it look like very medical.
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-322.svg title="Site-322, outside Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, PlaguePJP." width="250px"]]
++ Site-322, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
Based of the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Philadelphia Flag of Philadelphia].
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-333.svg title="Site-333, Atlantic City, New Jersey, DodoDevil." width="250px"]]
++ Site-333, Atlantic City, New Jersey
Based of the [https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Seal_of_Atlantic_City.svg Seal of Atlantic City], which features the lighthouse, boardwalk and some very ugly fish. This would actually be quite a stylish design without the fish, which is why I included them!
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-400.svg title="Site-400, Newcastle, Northern Ireland, NDHeckfire." width="250px"]]
++ Resource Site-400, Newcastle, Northern Ireland
Based of the flag of Northern Ireland, the Red Hand feels fitting for a site that contains a lot of humanoids, and the arrows at the bottom are stylised pine trees based on the site's location in the forest.
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-666.svg title="Site-666, Las Vegas, Rounderhouse." width="250px"]]
++  Site-666, Undervegas, Las Vegas
Based of the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Las_Vegas Flag of Las Vegas] with elements from the image from [[[SCP-4661]]].
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-theta.svg title="Site-θ, Yellowstone National Park, SCP-2000." width="250px"]]
++  Site-θ, Yellowstone National Park
There's a bit of inconsistency over whether the [[[SCP-2000]]] facility should be Site-2000 or [[[resurrection-new-faces-hub| Site-θ]]], but I went with theta as the more unique option. The colors are inspired by the memetic kill agent, the overlaid symbol is the [[[anomaly-classification-system-guide| ACS Thaumiel symbol]]], in Yellow to represent the Site's location.
[[/div]]


[[/div]]

[[=]]
+ Area Insignia
[[/=]]
I decided to give these a distinctive outline to distinguish them from sites, I don't like the way that having an A in front of or above the number looks.


[[div class="art-container"]]  

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Area-02.svg title="Area-02, MalyceGraves." width="250px"]]
++ Armed Reliquary Area-02, In Memoria, Adytum
Based on the [[[the-graveyard| The Kelipat Nogah Initiative]]] logo from [[[memoria-adytum| In Memoria, Adytum]]], since I couldn't think of much else that represents that series

[[/div]]
[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Area-09.svg title="Area 09, Nevada, HarryBlank." width="250px"]]
++ Area-09, ETTRA, Nevada
Inspired by the [[[resurrection-old-foes-hub| ETTRA]]] logo, recoloured to match the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Nevada Flag of Nevada].

[[/div]]
[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art%3Asecure-facilities-locations/Area-12-original.svg title="Area 12, USA" width="250px"]]
++ Biological Research Area-12
This design precedes [[[secure-facility-dossier-area-12| the Dossier]]], I was mostly going off the parazoology elements and the idea of the American wilderness. The Bison horns seemed fitting for that, the circle around it is meant to be [[[SCP-2584]]], the Loop Snake.
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Area-14.svg title="Area-14, Ruby Mountains, Nevada." width="250px"]]
++ Area-14, Ruby Mountains, Nevada
"Ruby Mountains" is an evocative name, I went with a design that looks jagged and fanged and it seems to work pretty well.

[[/div]]
[[div class="art"]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Area-27.svg title="Reliquary Area-27, Ottawa, Canada." width="250px"]]
++ Reliquary Area-27, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada
Based on the [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Ottawa Flag of Ottawa].

[[/div]]
[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Area-32.svg title="Area-27, Ruby Mountains, Nevada." width="250px"]]
++ Area-32, Mare Imbrium, The Moon
Design based on the waning moon.
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Area-179.svg title="Area-179, Pennsylvania." width="250px"]]
++ Area-179, Pennsylvania
Design based on the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Coat_of_arms_of_Pennsylvania Coat of Arms of Pennsylvania].
[[/div]]

[[/div]]

[[=]]
+ [[[department-contest| DEPARTMENT CON 2022]]]
[[/=]]

Insignia made for Facilities debuting in this contest. Some of the Secure Facility Dossiers stuck around long enough to make it to the actual facilities page, but I'm happy with the art I created.

[[div class="art-container"]]  

[[div class="art"]] show="▷ " hide="◁ Site-14, Sacremento, California"]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/jerden-insignia/Site-14.svg title="Site-14, Telecommunications Monitoring." width="250px"]]
++ Site-14, Sacremento, California
Based on the logo of the Telecommunications Monitoring Office by [[*user Agente Shuffle]] and the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_California Flag of California].
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/jerden-insignia/Site-122.svg title="Site-122, Logistics Department." width="250px"]]
++ Site-122, Denver, Colorado
Based of the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Denver Flag of Denver] with the addition a yellow plane replacing the sun, since it's under an airport and all about transport.
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/jerden-insignia/Site-169.svg title="Site-169, Anomalous Entity Engagement Division." width="250px"]]
++ Site-169, Glassford Hill, Arizona
Based on the logo of the Anomalous Entity Engagement Division by [[*user GreenGolem]] and the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Arizona Flag of Arizona]
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/jerden-insignia/Site-300.svg title="Site-300, Applied Thaumatology." width="250px"]]
++ Site-300, Multiple Locations
Based of the [[[desk-of-junior-designer-s-yvonne| Applied Thaumatology logo]]] by [[*user EstrellaYoshte]] with a Russia/Australia/New Zealand/NASA inspired colour scheme.
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/jerden-insignia/Site-infinity.svg title="Site-∞, Prescience Department." width="250px"]]
++ Site-∞, Cardiff, Wales
Based on the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Wales Flag of Wales], but with an [https://freesvg.org/dragon-circle Ouroborus] replacing the traditional dragon, since the serpent eating its own tail is an ancient symbol of eternity. One of the coolest designs I've done, I did a fair bit of editing to get the dragon to look right.
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/jerden-insignia/Area-314.svg title="Area-314, Accounting Department." width="250px"]]
++ Area-314, Nunavut, Canada
Based of the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Nunavut Flag of Nunavut]. Perfectly balanced, like all books should be. I'm very pleased that [[*user Rosysaturniidae]] liked it enough to use it in the [[[secure-facility-dossier-area-314| Area-314 Secure Facility Dossier]]].
[[/div]]

[[/div]]

[[=]]
+ Bonus Logos
[[/=]]

The insignia I made from an overabundance of enthusiasm. These don't actually meet my own requirements to add to the Facilities Page, I'll move them if they do.

[[div class="art-container"]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facilities-locations/Site-16.svg title="Site 16, California City, California."  width="250px"]]
++ Armed Site-16, California City, California
Based on Noach's logo for [https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/noachs-file/Site-16.png Armed Site 16], with the white background with a red band at the bottom inspired by the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_California Flag of California]. This work was all deleted, so I dropped the Site from the list and I guess I'll just keep this here.
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/jerden-insignia/Site-24.svg title="Site-24, South Dakota, General Harland." width="250px"]]
++ Site-24, South Dakota
This is the Site from [[[SCP-1309]]], so it's based on the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_South_Dakota Flag of South Dakota]. 
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/jerden-insignia/Site-72.svg title="Site-72, Bottom of the Ocean." width="250px"]]
++ Deep Sea Site-72
I was once part of the Fish Council Discord. Made this for them, but until now it never saw the light of day.
[[/div]]

[[/div]]

[[div class="art-container"]]

[[div class="art"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/jerden-insignia/Area-13.svg title="Area-13, Mt Olympus, Greece." width="250px"]]
++ Area-13, Mt Olympus, Greece
Colors are based on the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Greece Flag of Greece] plus an Omega symbol to represent [[[task-forces#omega-12|Omega-12]]].
[[/div]]

[[div class="art"]] 
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/jerden-insignia/Area-150.svg title="Area 150, Wyoming" width="250px"]]
++  Research Area-150, Wyoming
Made this one for [[*user Liryn]], based on the [https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/liryn/ATOM.svg 150 symbol] and the colors of the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Wyoming Flag of Wyoming].

[[/div]]

[[/div]]

[[=]]
+ Commentary
[[/=]]

With thanks to [[*user HarryBlank]], I read through his [[[the-time-after-time-password-hub| globe trotting adventure]]] and thought "Those Site Insignia are pretty cool, I wish every Site had one".  Next thing you know he's sent me the template, and I start getting into Vector Graphics! Translating [[[http://scp-int.wikidot.com/standortliste| The German Sites Page]]] was another inspiration, since every German Site has its own Coat of arms - it's worth checking out my translation of it. Additional thanks to everyone who offered feedback on these, and to everyone who created and uploaded the art I use (on this site, and on the internet more broadly). 

It's useful to have a simple and consistent template, especially for something like the facilities page. Some Sites have more complex insignia, and I am a fan of those, I just see this as a flag vs. seal/coat of arms distinction - the images below are designed to be immediately recognisable even at small size, which is why I've avoided text as much as possible (they already have numbers) and heavily based these on state/national flags.
